enrollConfirmFooterDescription: Secure your purchases with Virtual card so merchants don't see your card number.
enrollConfirmTitle: Enrol virtual card in just 2 steps!
fillingVirtualCard: We're filling your virtual card infoâ€¦
fillingVirtualCardDescription: We are connecting with your bank to generate card details for this transaction. This may take a few seconds.
fillingVirtualCardFailedDescription: Your card issuer is unable to generate virtual card details at the moment. Please try autofilling the card again or disable virtual card.
readyDescription: Edge enables you to shop securely by sending a unique set of one-time use card details to this merchant.
securityDescription: This added layer of security better protects you from data breaks or hacks.
tokenizedSuccessDescription: We have updated your card with a virtual card number and a one-time use CVV.
virtualCardReadyFlyoutDescription: Your virtual card details have been filled in. If not, click card details below to copy.
virtualCardSystemFailureDescription: We are unable to retrieve your virtual card details. Please visit $1 for your virtual card details.
